action_sequences: A hand picks up the green cuboid and then places it in front of the blue hexagonal prism.
A hand picks up the purple triangular prism and then places it to the left of the blue hexagonal prism.
A hand picks up the red cylinder and then places it to the right of the purple triangular prism.
code:
green_cuboid_pos=getpos('green cuboid')
moveto(green_cuboid_pos)
pick()
blue_hexagonalprism_front=getpos('blue hexagonalprism','front')
moveto(blue_hexagonalprism_front)
place()

purple_triangularprism_pos=getpos('purple triangularprism')
moveto(purple_triangularprism_pos)
pick()
blue_hexagonalprism_left=getpos('blue hexagonalprism','left')
moveto(blue_hexagonalprism_left)
place()

red_cylinder_pos=getpos('red cylinder')
moveto(red_cylinder_pos)
pick()
purple_triangularprism_right=getpos('purple triangularprism','right')
moveto(purple_triangularprism_right)
place()
